general.description: Short guidance for the existed commands

commands.name: /help
commands.description: Shows all available commands of Bottany or commands in a specific category. We love Kevy

commands.name: /weather
commands.description: Weather utilities (e.g., today/forecast) for a given city

drawing.description: Knowledge from academic sources about drawing techniques, tools, and more.

commands.name: /drawing
commands.description: Drawing-related commands (generation, tips, or utilities depending on the module)

commands.name: /freegames
commands.description: Lists currently available free games and selected discounts across supported platforms.

commands.name: /tesla
commands.description: Brief introductions to Nikola Tesla’s inventions, based on official sources with patent numbers. Each time it is used, a different invention is shown.

commands.name: /davinci
commands.description: A varied introduction to Leonardo da Vinci’s works. Academic resources are always used.

gaming products (part 1).description: Consoles and computers (curated, referenced). Part 1 covers up to 2011.

commands.name: /gaming product
commands.description: Shows a random gaming product with release year, short intro, image (if available), and sources (Part 1 ≤ 2011).

commands.name: /gaming year_part1
commands.description: Lists products released in a given year (Part 1: up to 2011). If no year is provided, shows a summary by year.

commands.name: /console random
commands.description: Shows a random game console with release year, short intro, image (if available), and sources.

games firsts.description: First and early commercially released games (curated).

commands.name: /games first100
commands.description: Lists up to the first 100 commercially released games from the curated registry (expandable).

commands.name: /games by_year
commands.description: Shows early commercially released games by year, or lists a specific year when provided.
